Module io.helidon.integrations.vault.auths.approle

Package io.helidon.integrations.vault.auths.approle

AppRole authentication method for Vault.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AppRoleAuth
    Vault authentication method for AppRole.
    AppRoleAuthRx
    Vault authentication method for AppRole.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppRoleAuthProvider
    Java Service Loader implementation for AppRole authentication method.
    AppRoleVaultAuth
    Vault authentication for AppRole.
    AppRoleVaultAuth.Builder
    Fluent API builder for AppRoleVaultAuth.

    Create AppRole request and response.

    CreateAppRole.Response
